name: Totally Accurate Polikics
description:
Is a quiz that tests your knowledge of history/politics (and memes). It is pretty short and you may find it hard. The score system works like this: each question is worth 10 points if you get it correct you get 10 points but if you get it wrong you lose 10 points. 90 to 110 is average, 0 to 80 is fine, -200 to -10 is pretty bad.

Unfortunately Windows forms has not yet been ported to other OS so it only supports windows for now.

Please note that this quiz is meant to be for your enjoyment and not to make anybody upset or support any ideology or group.
